projects.project_description:
This application is controlled through the finger as virtual touch system for IOT.
So, there are many effect and a feedback and a transition.

It is displayed contents based on youtube, so it was developed using the api was provided by youtube.

Machine Learning require so much training data.
We need the tool for Training Data.

We already have it but it is local environment.
So, I thought we need to transfer to remote it.

clients want to modify a content in an application.
Also their content didn't want to allow to unauthorized users.

To meet to the requirements, I decided to use AWS-SDK.

projects.project_subtitle: for creativity, logical and thinking skills
projects.project_description:
We could need something to solve math problem.
For example, If one of them is needed a coin, we should find a coin.

I want to solve the problem without any preparation.
I provide it at PC or Mobile.

we needed to measure performance for new features.

To deal with a lot of data, I first stored it in redis and then periodically stored it in db.

I want to expose my product in Naver Shopping.
For it, we need to connect db-url.
So I created admin page for it.

It is difficult to know if the content on the web is trustworthy. So I wanted to make a fair space for trustworthy content.

It was developed using the data was provided by search engine through the open API or crawling.

Mobile coupons are wasting a lot of money.
Because it disappears after their the expiration date.

I thought it would be nice if there was space to safely buy and sell mobile coupons.

The menu of the dormitory restaurant was shown on the website, but there were many inconveniences. I thought it would be useful if there was something I could check as soon as I turned on the phone like a wiget.

I can't access to the database for menu, so I got a data through the web crawl. After that, the menu of dormitory was shown through webview and android-widget-function.
